snippet: The agreement in principle still must be approved by the board of the union and the pilots.
abstract: American Airlines and its pilots union reach agreement in principal over new contract, which could ultimately pave the way for the airline to exit bankruptcy; parent company AMR Corporation filed for bankruptcy last November and has reached labor agreements with all of its unions except for the pilots.
lead_paragraph: The agreement in principle still must be approved by the board of the union and the pilots.

headline.seo: American Airlines and Pilots Agree on a New Contract
headline.main: American Airlines and Pilots Agree on a New Contract
headline.print_headline: American Airlines and Pilots Agree on a New Contract
